faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Have any questions? Here are the answers to the most common questions.

questions.question: What video platforms are supported?
questions.answer: ClipNotes works with public links from Zoom, Google Meet, Loom, YouTube, and most video platforms. If your platform isn't listed, let us know!

questions.question: How is my video privacy handled?
questions.answer: We take your privacy very seriously. Videos are processed securely and removed from our servers once the transcription is generated. We don't share your information with third parties.

questions.question: How accurate are the transcriptions?
questions.answer: Our AI system offers approximately 95-98% accuracy under ideal conditions. Audio quality, strong accents, or background noise may affect accuracy.

questions.question: Can I try the service before paying?
questions.answer: We offer the Starter plan for $5/month with 60 minutes of processing. Perfect for trying all features without commitment.
